body.transcript:
Hello! Thank you for calling Noteworthy, the premier music school. My name is Richard Gonzales. May I have your name, please?

Hi Richard, my name is Patricia Hughes. I'm not feeling my best today, but I wanted to inquire about your pricing.

I'm sorry to hear that you're feeling down, Patricia. Let me help you with the information you need. Could you tell me which instrument you are interested in learning?

I'm interested in piano lessons. I hope they are not too expensive.

We offer a variety of pricing options. Could I also have your zip code to check for any location-specific offers?

Sure, my zip code is nine zero one two three.

Thank you. Let me check that for you, Patricia. Our beginner piano course is priced at one two zero dollars for four sessions per month.

That sounds manageable. Can you also tell me if there's a registration fee?

Of course. There's a one-time registration fee of thirty dollars. We try to keep our costs affordable for everyone.

Thank you, Richard. That really helps.

You're welcome, Patricia. Thank you for considering Noteworthy. If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out. Take care, and have a good day!

analysis.body: In this conversation, Richard Gonzales from Noteworthy discusses pricing with Patricia Hughes. The agent provides assistance and information about Music School.
